ja404:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja404:1.3_0: for a single day or night,
ja404:2.2_0: taking care of the lay life,
ja404:3.1_0: But the true fool is said to be one
ja404:3.3_0: Having gone to the host of mind,
ja404:4.1_0: It’s not good to venerate a fool,
ja404:5.4_0: he’s a frightening over his shoulder.
ja404:6.1_0: But one with ethics and wisdom
ja404:6.2_0: on the side of the pure,
ja404:7.3_0: a wise one judges others from the group,
ja404:7.4_0: or one who gives up sensual desire.
